source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SCENE00000<tab>
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SCENE00000<tab>

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_TALK_00<tab>Well met! I've been dispatched by the Adventurers' Guild to recruit volunteers for special small-scale operations known as guildhests. You look to be of sound mind and body. Might you consider joining?
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_TALK_00私は冒険者ギルドの一員。
一人では解決し得ぬ特殊任務を発行する
「ギルドオーダー」の統括をしている。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_TITLE<tab>What would you like to do?
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_TITLE<tab>何をしますか？

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_00<tab>Participate in a guildhest.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_00<tab>ギルドオーダーの任務を受ける

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_01<tab>Learn more about guildhests.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_01<tab>ギルドオーダーとは？

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_02<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_MENU_02<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_NOT_SELECT_STAGE_00<tab>Well met! I've been dispatched by the Adventurers' Guild to recruit volunteers for special small-scale operations known as guildhests.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_NOT_SELECT_STAGE_00私は冒険者ギルドの一員。
一人では解決し得ぬ特殊任務を発行する
「ギルドオーダー」の統括をしている。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_NOT_SELECT_STAGE_01<tab>These operations will pit those volunteers against deadly foes, and the odds won't always be in their favor. This is why we require all participants to be of sound mind and body─something that you do not yet appear to be.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_NOT_SELECT_STAGE_01しかし、見たところ、お前の実力はまだまだ未熟。
まだ、この任務を任せるときではないようだ。
修練を積んでくることだな。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_TITLE<tab>Select an operation.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_TITLE<tab>任務を選択してください

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_00<tab>Seek & Destroy.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_00<tab>討伐隊募集

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_01<tab>Sprint & Obey.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_01<tab>隊長の指導。早さと見極め。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_02<tab>Shield & Sweep.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_02<tab>盾役と掃除役

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_03<tab>Under the Armor.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_03<tab>彷徨う死霊を討て！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_04<tab>Pulling Poison Posies.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_04<tab>有毒妖花を駆除せよ！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_05<tab>Stinging Back.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_05<tab>無法者「似我蜂団」を撃滅せよ！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_06<tab>Down the Black Rabbit Hole.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_06<tab>黒兎堂のマイセンタを護送せよ！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_07<tab>Flicking Sticks and Taking Names.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_07<tab>爆弾魔ゴブリン軍団を撃滅せよ！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_08<tab>All's Well that Ends in the Well.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_08<tab>夢幻のブラキシオを討て！

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_SELECT_STAGE_MENU_CANCEL<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_TITLE<tab>Commence the operation?
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_TITLE<tab>任務を開始しますか？

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_YES<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_YES<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_NO<tab>Not yet
target: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_START_MENU_NO<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_00<tab>To participate in the operation “Under the Armor,” you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 20 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_00「彷徨う死霊を討て！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル20以上のプレイヤー4名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_01<tab>To participate in the operation “Pulling Poison Posies,” you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 20 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_01「有毒妖花を駆除せよ！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル20以上のプレイヤー4名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_02<tab>To participate in the operation “Stinging Back,” you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 20 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_02「無法者「似我蜂団」を撃滅せよ！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル20以上のプレイヤー8名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_03<tab>To participate in the operation “Down the Black Rabbit Hole,” you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 25 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_03「黒兎堂のマイセンタを護送せよ！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル25以上のプレイヤー4名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_04<tab>To participate in the operation “Flicking Sticks and Taking Names,” you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 25 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_04「爆弾魔ゴブリン軍団を撃滅せよ！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル25以上のプレイヤー4名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_05<tab>To participate in the operation “All's Well that Ends in the Well,” you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 25 or higher.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_INFO_05「夢幻のブラキシオを討て！」を開始するためには、
ファイター＆ソーサラーのレベル25以上のプレイヤー8名で
パーティを組む必要があります。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_00<tab>Guildhests are similar to guildleves in that clients in need of assistance petition the Adventurers' Guild to find them volunteers. Adventurers are then summoned at the guild's behest to undertake these tasks. The difference is that while guildleves can be accepted by individuals, guildhest operations will often require parties of four to eight persons.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_00「ギルドオーダー」とは、冒険者ギルドが発行する
パーティ向けの特殊任務のことです。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_01<tab>Beyond that, the rules are simple. Finish the guildhest objectives before time expires, and you and your companions will be promptly rewarded for services rendered. Drag your feet, though, and you won't see a single coin.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_01任務の場所や内容はさまざまですが、
それぞれ制限時間内に目的を達成することで、
報酬を得ることができます。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_02<tab>If it is your first time tackling an operation, you will also be provided with a bonus upon completion.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_02なお、その任務を初めて達成した際は
報酬にボーナスがつきます。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_03<tab>Finally, proving yourself on the field will unlock more high-profile tasks. Other battlewardens stationed throughout the Twelveswood may also provide you with similar work, but only if you are deemed capable.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_BEHEST_TALK_03挑戦可能な任務の種類は、
新しい場所への到達、キャラクターレベルの上昇、
特定の任務の達成などで増えていきます。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_ERROR_TALK<tab>You were unable to commence the operation “<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>.”
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_ERROR_TALK『』を
開始できませんでした。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_00<tab>Wait... Might this be your first time participating in a guildhest? I remember my first hest. It was the night of my twentieth nameday. My fellow guildmates invited me to join them in the slaying of a family of peistes who were stealing chocobo eggs from Bentbranch Meadows.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_00「ギルドオーダー」に挑むのは初めてか？
これは、決して一人の力だけでは達成し得ぬ、
複数人の協力が必要な特殊任務だ。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_01<tab>The moment we arrived, one of the terrible beasts immediately turned to me and charged. The thing was thrice my size and had already maimed several chocobokeeps.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_01周辺住民や各組織からの依頼などのうち、
特別な任務を集めているからな……。
お前たち、冒険者の結束力が試されるだろう。

source: TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_02<tab>There was no way I could win, so I simply froze and waited for the end. But that's when I remembered that I was not alone. My friends rallied around me, and together we defeated the peistes! That, my friend, is what a guildhest is truly about.
target:
TEXT_CMNBHTENTERLV020ST0003_00013_HOWTO_02もちろん、任務を達成すれば報酬を与えよう。
初めて任務をこなしたときは、多少は報酬にも
色をつけてやる。せいぜい気張るんだな。
